member.name: T:Lokad.Cqrs.Core.Directory.Default.IConsume`1

summary.para: Default CQRS interface for interface-base domain setup of message consumers. By default Lokad.CQRS scans user assemblies for message handlers inheriting from this interface.
If you don't want to reference Lokad.CQRS assemblies in your domain, you can declare your own consumer interface and point to it in the configuration, as shown in the samples.

member.remarks: Look in the samples for more details on the usage

member.name: T:Lokad.Cqrs.Core.Directory.Default.IConsumeMessage

summary.para: Default CQRS interface for interface-base domain setup. By default Lokad.CQRS scans user assemblies for message handlers inheriting from this interface. You don't need to inherit from interface, use instead.
If you don't want to reference Lokad.CQRS assemblies in your domain, you can declare your own consumer interface and point to it in the configuration, as shown in the samples.

member.remarks: Look in the samples for more details on the usage

member.summary: Contains information about the committed data

summary.para: Persists records in a tape stream, using SHA1 hashing and "magic" number sequences to detect corruption and offer partial recovery.
System information is written in such a way, that if data is unicode human-readable, then the file will be human-readable as well.

member.name: T:Lokad.Cqrs.Core.Dispatch.IEnvelopeQuarantine
member.summary: Implements quarantine logic for the specific message handler. Default implementation is

member.name: M:Lokad.Cqrs.Core.Dispatch.IEnvelopeQuarantine.TryToQuarantine(Lokad.Cqrs.Core.Inbox.EnvelopeTransportContext,System.Exception)
member.summary: Tries to quarantine the specified envelope. Implementation can decide whether we need to give another try to process the envelope (by returning False) or if quarantine should accept the envelope completely. Then processor will discard the queue from it's incoming queue and leave it up to the quarantine to record it, push to poison etc.
member.returns: True if envelope should be quarantined right away (i.e. exception happened 4 times) and is not excepted to be processed by the queue any more; False otherwise

member.name: M:Lokad.Cqrs.Core.Dispatch.IEnvelopeQuarantine.TryRelease(Lokad.Cqrs.Core.Inbox.EnvelopeTransportContext)
member.summary: Tries to release envelope record from the partial or full quarantine (I.e.: when message has been successfully processed and quarantine can forget about it forever).
